Articles.Content:
Something crashes my PC so far it powercycles, I already confirmed the temps with a stress test. It also doesn't happen without mods, but that could have been luck since I only launched 1 Rocket to test it unmodded.

Log file

Mods Installed:

000_ClickThroughBlocker
001_ToolbarControl
999_KSP-Recall
BoulderCo
EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements
HideEmptyTechTreeNodes
Kerbaltek
MemGraph
zFinal_FilterExtensions

Edited October 3, 2021 by wezerl

If any software causes your computer to crash that hard then you have serious hardware issues,

Clogged fans, under powered power supply, bad cooling, all comes to mind.

On 10/4/2021 at 4:32 PM, Curveball Anders said:

If any software causes your computer to crash that hard then you have serious hardware issues,

Clogged fans, under powered power supply, bad cooling, all comes to mind.

 

Nope, stress testet my GPU and CPU with Furmark and CPU Burner for over 2 hours, temps are fine and the Supply Voltages are fine too.
Check out all the mods one by one. Probably one of the mods do not work probably with the other mod. It's a common thing with modding, so you better check them out.

On 10/7/2021 at 11:22 AM, Jack White said:

Check out all the mods one by one. Probably one of the mods do not work probably with the other mod. It's a common thing with modding, so you better check them out. 

I'm not sure what Mod it was exactly but removing some fixed it. Still really weird that it bootloops my PC tough.
